original: A 2015 study examined the attitudes and practices of clinicians and scientific research staff regarding data sharing. The findings indicated that a majority of respondents considered data sharing to be important for their work, although many acknowledged their limited expertise in the area. The survey included 190 participants, of whom 135 identified as clinical or basic research scientists. These individuals were part of the Intramural
